The sequence b(n) := (n-1)!^2 satisfies the same recurrence with the initial conditions b(1) = 1, b(2) = 1. It follows that a(n+1) = n!^2*(1 + 1/(1 - 1/(5 - 4/(10 - ...-(n-1)^2/(n^2+1))))).
